# localizedDescription

**Instance Property**

The pass’s localized description.

## Declaration

```swift
var localizedDescription: String { get }
```

## Discussion

This property provides access to the description string from the pass’s JSON file. For more information about the JSON format, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/PassKit_PG/Creating.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012195-CH4] in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/PassKit_PG/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012195]. For information about adding localized strings to the JSON file, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/PassKit_PG/Creating.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012195-CH4-SW54] in that same guide.

## Identifying a pass

- **passType**: The pass’s type.
- **PKPassType**: Types of passes.
- **secureElementPass**: The pass that contains an accompanying credential that the device stores in the Secure Element.
- **serialNumber**: A value that uniquely identifies the pass.
- **passTypeIdentifier**: The pass’s pass type identifier.
- **deviceName**: The name of the device that hosts the pass.
- **localizedName**: The localized name for the pass’s template.
- **isRemotePass**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the pass is on a paired device, such as an Apple Watch.
- **paymentPass**: The underlying payment pass.
